Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Phylloseptin-2.1TR (natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; XXA; UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of the peptide shows 94.7% similarity toPhylloseptin-PC. Mol Wt:  1986.432; GRAVY: 1.31.Activity:Active against E. coli (MIC 50 uM), S. epidermidis (MIC 12.5 uM), and C. albicans (MIC 100 uM). 7/2018; 7/2021.
Literature Information.Author: Mechkarska M, Coquet L, Leprince J, Auguste RJ, Jouenne T, Mangoni ML, Conlon JM.2018
Literature Information.Reference: Comp Biochem Physiol Part D Genomics Proteomics. 2018 Jun 30;28:72-79. doi: 10.1016/j.cbd.2018.06.006.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Peptidomic analysis of the host-defense peptides in skin secretions of the Trinidadian leaf frog Phyllomedusa trinitatis (Phyllomedusidae).
